name: Solitaire Wonders
description:
Solitaire Wonders is an amazing game of skill and vigilance. The faster and more observant you are the more possible is your victory over your opponent! Your goal is to stack all the cards in 4 piles, starting from an Ace and ending to a King.

While playing live with other opponents in Solitaire Wonders, you are able to see their progress real-time, a feature which makes the game even more competitive and fun!

Are you in to explore the Ancient wonders?
